description: Last Six Edges Edge Orientation (LSE EO) is a substep of the Roux method. Since LSE is the 4th step, the substeps are typically called 4a, 4b, and 4c. This algorithm set is for substep 4a.
4b: Solve upper left and upper right edges (ULUR)

cases.name: Front 1 - 1
algs: M U' M' U' M U' M'
M U M' U M U M'

cases.name: Back 1 - 1
algs: M' U' M U' M' U' M'
M' U M U M' U M
M' U2 M' U2 M' U' M'
M' U2 M' U2 M' U M'

cases.name: Opposite - 2
algs: M' U2 M' U2 M U' M'

cases.name: Opposite - 0
algs: M' U' M U M' U' M'

cases.name: 0 - Opposite
algs: M' U' M U M' U' M'

cases.name: Adjacent - 0
algs: M' U' M' U2 M' U' M'

cases.name: All 6
algs: M' U' M' U2 M' U' M U' M' U' M'
